_comment: Copy this file to secrets.json and fill in your actual credentials. NEVER commit secrets.json!

_instructions.hetzner_token: Get from: https://console.hetzner.cloud/ → Security → API tokens
_instructions.hetzner_ssh_key: Get from: https://console.hetzner.cloud/ → Security → SSH keys
_instructions.cloudflare_account_id: Get from: Cloudflare dashboard → Workers & Pages → Overview (right sidebar)
_instructions.cloudflare_api_token: Get from: Cloudflare dashboard → My Profile → API Tokens → Create Token (with DNS Edit permission)
_instructions.cloudflare_zone_id: Get from: Cloudflare dashboard → grove.place → Overview (right sidebar)
_instructions.r2_credentials: Get from: Cloudflare dashboard → R2 → Manage R2 API Tokens → Create API Token
_instructions.heartwood_credentials: Get from your GroveAuth instance OAuth app configuration
